member.name: METAHEADER
member.summary: The METAHEADER structure contains information about a Windows-format metafile.

summary.para: Specifies whether the metafile is in memory or recorded in a disk file. This member can be one of the following values.

listheader.description: Metafile is in a disk file.

member.name: METAHEADER.mtHeaderSize
member.summary: The size, in words, of the metafile header.

member.name: METAHEADER.mtVersion
member.summary: The system version number. The version number for metafiles that support device-independent bitmaps (DIBs) is 0x0300. Otherwise, the version number is 0x0100.

member.name: METAHEADER.mtSize
member.summary: The size, in words, of the file.

member.name: METAHEADER.mtNoObjects
member.summary: The maximum number of objects that exist in the metafile at the same time.

member.name: METAHEADER.mtMaxRecord
member.summary: The size, in words, of the largest record in the metafile.
